channel.title: Voting sciprt
channel.description: can i add a vote page and u have to vote on all links before claim ur reward ? on enjin.com im using premium plan

item.title: Voting sciprt
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“i_pwn_u1, post:5, topic:533717”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=652514.msg4372206#msg4372206 date=1381014145]

http://www.enjin.com/features/plans

  1. there is no “premium” plan.
  2. This isn’t the section to ask about web questions
  3. don’t use enjin, it’s garbage.

Edit:
Also, if enjin doesn’t allow ftp. Then your answer is no.

ok sorry but can i use 000webhost for that because im new on website i dont know anythign and i have nothing so yes can i use 00webhost?

Yes, you can use 000webhost for it. But in order to use remote MySQL, you must purchase the upgraded version.

And no, you aren’t new. I’ve seen you post in the wrong section many of times…
That and you’re a senior member registered in 2011
[/quote]

ok sorry but how i can add this to my server? http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/406707-new-runetoplist-voting-script-v2-vote4items.html do i need the remote mysql for that to?[/quote]
Not to add it into your website. But if you want your server to connect to it, then yes…

Read full topic
